definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
lit. to flood (idiom)/fig. rampant/in plague proportions

sentences.english: The methamphetamine "pervitin" is one of the most widespread drugs in the area because of ease of availability.
sentences.chinese: 脱氧麻黄碱在当地可以轻易获得，因而泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: In 1970, high-grade heroin and opium flooded Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 1970年东南亚的高纯度海洛因和鸦片泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: Poyang Lake helps keep down floods on the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 在汛期，都阳湖有助于制止长江泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: Temples of witchcraft are so widespread that they have turned into kinds of social public hazard.
sentences.chinese: 宋代民间淫祠泛滥成灾，成为一种严重的社会公害。

sentences.english: HIV and drug use are skyrocketing in the valley.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病和毒品在费尔干纳盆地泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: Indonesia is the rainy season, torrential rains in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 印尼目前正值雨季，许多地区暴雨成灾。

sentences.english: In history, the Yellow River flow City often are swamped.
sentences.chinese: 在历史上，黄河流城经常泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: It's called the sickle-cell mutation and spread through Africa once malaria became a problem there.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲当疟疾成灾的时候，该突变遍布整个非洲。

sentences.english: The distribution of ratio of heavy disaster frequency to the area affected by hailstone is basically contrary.
sentences.chinese: 重灾频率和成灾面积比的分布与受灾频率基本相反。

sentences.english: Fire and water are good servants , but bad masters.
sentences.chinese: 水火可以成为忠仆，用它不慎成灾主。

sentences.english: In the end, superfluous tables were eliminated from the page.
sentences.chinese: 最终从网页中消灭了泛滥成灾的表格。

sentences.english: Days of torrential rain in Prachuap County, Thailand, caused severe flooding.
sentences.chinese: 泰国巴蜀县，连日豪雨淹水成灾。

sentences.english: After a long period of rain the river may overflow its banks.
sentences.chinese: 久雨之后，河水会泛滥成灾。

sentences.english: The only catch is, you might get a house gecko infestation next.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的风险是，接下来你有可能要面对壁虎成灾噢。

sentences.english: Now the wind to flowers do not open, only a love sickness.
sentences.chinese: 赎缡如今风不来花不开，只剩一片相思成灾。

sentences.english: The data of area affected is actually the date of area affected absolutely in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年以后成灾面积实际为绝收面积。

definition: lit. to flood (idiom)/fig. rampant/in plague proportions
to be in flood/to overflow (the banks)/to inundate/to spread unchecked
insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
to break out (of disease etc)/to suddenly get rich (or prominent)
